title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 360 - Tax Waivers And Certain Other Notice Requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 360 - Tax Waivers And Certain Other Notice Requirements

State Regulations
§ 360.1 - Payment, delivery and transfer of cash, deposits and open-market securities whose value is not more than $30,000
§ 360.2 - Delivery of contents of safe deposit boxes of deceased residents
§ 360.3 - Delivery of contents of safe deposit boxes of nonresidents
§ 360.4 - Transfer of partnership assets after the death of a partner
§ 360.5 - Payment of death benefits under employees' pension or profit-sharing plans
§ 360.6 - Payment of life insurance proceeds
§ 360.7 - Annuity and other payments under certain trusts, plans and accounts
§ 360.8 - Payment or certification of checks drawn before decedent's death

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. G, pt. 360

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 249-c c, 962

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
